name: GitHub Repository Protection Agent
tagline: AI-powered repository protection with blockchain-based ownership verification and automated DMCA generation.
description: An advanced AI agent built with LangChain and LlamaIndex that integrates deeply with the Flow blockchain to provide immutable IP protection for developers. The agent automates security audits, registers code ownership on-chain, monitors for copyright infringement, and automatically generates professionally formatted DMCA takedown notices to protect developers' work.
